item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Matt. This is a blog to document my homebrewing. I like brewing a wide range of styles, but some of my focuses are flavorful low alcohol beers, IPAs, and lots of mixed fermentation weirdness. I’m from the Baltimore area and I confess to being a bit of a Sapwood Cellars fanboy. I encourage you to ask any questions in the comments on this site. If you would rather email me directly please write to matt@wallflowerbrewing.com

item.title: Recipes
item.description: IPA Mosaic/Nelson/Hallertau Blanc NEIPA Galaxy/Citra NEIPA Citra/Simcoe Double NEIPA Homegrown Hops IPA Sour Extract Berliner Weisse Solera Barrel Flanders Red Pale Apricot Sour Cherry wine Tart “Rustic” Saison Funky Saison Vinifera White - Pale saison with Brett and oak, blended with a moderate amount of white wine. Saison Vinifera Red - Pale saison with Brett and oak, blended with a larger amount of red wine. Dark Saison I (zante currant) Funky Cider 2019 Session Beers Citra Session Ale Spring Kolsch Spring Kolsch 2 Best Bitter Misc Rye Barrel Stout Rye Barrel Old Ale Saisonstein Hoppy Saison
